snippet.title: tchunk Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A calming short story adventure where you play as a dog to discover where and who you are. All the while you are free to explore the island and interact with the local population.

Wishlist via Steam page here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2793270/Tchunk/

Follow our studio at: https://www.vellimedia.com

Key features:
-A beautifully crafted and calming open world to run, jump and swim through at your own pace, utilizing Unreal Engine 5.
-Meet and interact with the local animals on the island. Some may have found themselves in the exact same place you are now, perhaps they can offer guidance?
-Piece together different clues and complete missions for the others on the island to discover a path to another world.
-A tailor made story that takes influence from real events to convey a feeling any pet owner has felt before.
-A calming hand crafted sound track comprised of acoustic guitars and soothing synth tracks.
-Want to adventure under the northern lights or perhaps a setting sun? Gain the ability to change the time of day as you progress through the story.
-Barkour! Run and jump to new heights, be it the watchtower overlooking the entire island or the hill crest on the edge of the ocean.

Original music piece by afrodrumming on freesound.org, remixed and modified by Alex Ferkovich.
